title: Equations of motion - horizontal constant a

content.question: A car on a straight track is at position <math alttext="x sub i " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mstyle></math> and has initial speed <math alttext="v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> when it begins to slow down with constant acceleration of magnitude <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math>. When the car reaches position <math alttext="x sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math> it has speed <math alttext="v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for <math alttext="x sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub f, end sub, squared, minus v sub i, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 a, end fraction, plus x sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub i, end sub, squared, minus v sub f, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 a, end fraction, plus x sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub f, end sub, squared, minus v sub i, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 a, end fraction, minus x sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub i, end sub, squared, minus v sub f, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 a, end fraction, minus x sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub i, end sub, squared, minus v sub f, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 a, end fraction, plus x sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
